question: How do I apply for an undergraduate degree?
answer:
Domestic student? See our domestic application process (https://www.uts.edu.au/study/undergraduate/admission-requirements/application-process).
International student? See our international application process (https://www.uts.edu.au/study/international)

question: How do I apply for a postgraduate coursework degree?
answer:
Domestic student? See our domestic application process (https://www.uts.edu.au/study/postgraduate/essential-info/applying-postgraduate-coursework-degree).
International student? See our international application process (https://www.uts.edu.au/study/international)

question: How do I apply for a postgraduate research degree?
answer: See our postgraduate research degree application process. (https://www.uts.edu.au/research-and-teaching/graduate-research/future-research-students/application-essentials)

question: How do I apply for non-award/cross-institutional study at UTS?
answer: See our non-award and cross institutional study page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/future-students/undergraduate/admission-requirements/application-process/non-award-and-cross)

question: How do I apply for exchange/study abroad at UTS?
answer: See our study abroad or exchange page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/study/international/study-abroad-and-exchange-uts/choose-your-program)

question: When is the last day to accept my offer
answer:
For Summer session 2022: 13 December 2022
For Autumn session 2023: 6 March 2023

question: How do I defer my offer?
answer: See our criteria for deferring your course. (https://www.uts.edu.au/commencing-students/essential-information/deferring-your-course-commencement)

question: How do I enrol in subjects?
answer: See our enrolling in subjects page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/your-enrolment/enrolling-subjects)

question: How do I create my timetable
answer: To build your timetable, log in to MyTimetable (https://mytimetable.uts.edu.au/) and follow the My Timetable help guide. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/using-uts-systems/student-forms-apps-and-systems/my-timetable/my-timetable-help-guide)

question: When is the last day to enrol in subjects?
answer: See our last day to enrol page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/important-dates/last-day-enrol)

question: When is the last day to withdraw from subjects without penalty (census date)?
How do I submit an eRequest?
answer: If you need to make official changes to your study plan that you cannot self-manage in My Student Admin, you must submit an online application called an eRequest. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/using-uts-systems/student-forms-apps-and-systems/erequest)

question: I want to take a break from studying (leave of absence).
answer: See our leave of absence page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/your-enrolment/enrolment-changes/leave-absence-your-course)

question: How do I get my student ID card?
answer: See our Student ID card page. (https://www.uts.edu.au/current-students/managing-your-course/your-student-info/student-id-cards)

question: My student ID card is lost, stolen or damaged.
answer: Apply for a replacement student card. (https://forms.uts.edu.au/web/index.cfm)
